testsuite.name: com.puce.NakanoStay.controllers.RoomControllerTest

testcase.name: should return 500 when unexpected error occurs()
should return room availability with no occupied ranges when room is always available()
should update room when put()
should return 404 when making non-existent room unavailable()
should return 404 when deleting non-existent room()
should return 409 when making already unavailable room unavailable()
should return empty list when hotel has no rooms()
should return 409 when making already available room available()
should return 400 when get availability with invalid date range()
should make room available when put available()
should return 400 when create room with validation error()
should return 400 when updating room with validation error()
should return empty list when no rooms exist()
should return 404 when making non-existent room available()
should return all rooms when get all()
should return 404 when get availability for non-existent room()
should return room availability with no available dates when room is fully occupied()
should return 400 when get availability with past start date()
should create room when post()
should return 404 when hotel not found for room creation()
should create room with null room type when post()
should delete room when delete by id()
should return room availability when get availability()
should return rooms by hotel when get by hotel id()
should return 409 when create room with conflict error()
should make room unavailable when put unavailable()
should return 404 when updating non-existent room()
